meanings.definition: One of seven offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The family was surprised by the arrival of a septuplet.
meanings.sent2: The hospital celebrated the birth of a septuplet.
meanings.sent3: The septuplet of puppies caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The septuplet of trees in the garden stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The septuplet of ducklings followed their mother closely.

meanings.definition: A group of seven similar things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a septuplet of colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: The septuplet of books on the shelf caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The septuplet of cupcakes looked too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: The septuplet of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The septuplet of flowers added beauty to the garden.
